title: For Sale:  Magpul Pmags, 10rd AR15 Magazine
postcontent: The PMAG 10 GEN M3 is a 10-round 5.56x45 NATO (.223 Remington) polymer magazine for AR15/M4 compatible weapons. Incorporating new material technology and manufacturing processes for enhanced strength, durability, and reliability, the PMAG 10 provides next-generation performance for those needing lower profile magazines. While the GEN M3 is optimized for Colt-spec AR15/M4 platforms, modified internal and external geometry also permits operation with a range of additional weapons such as the HK® 416/MR556A1/M27 IAR, British SA-80, FN® SCAR™ MK 16/16S, and others. The PMAG 10 GEN M3 features a long-life stainless steel spring, four-way anti-tilt follower for reliable feeding, and an easy to disassemble flared floorplate to aid extraction and handling of the magazine while providing improved drop protection. A redesigned bolt catch notch in the rear of the magazine provides increased bolt catch clearance, while an over-travel stop on the spine helps ensure the magazine will not over-insert on compatible weapons. In addition, an included pop-off Impact/Dust Cover can optionally be used to minimize debris intrusion and protect against potential damage to the top cartridge during storage and transit. Made in U.S.A. Features True 10-round capacity that does not require limiters, pins, rivets, etc. Next-generation impact and crush resistant polymer construction. Wide compatibility with non Colt-spec platforms. Anti-tilt follower and constant-curve internal geometry for increased reliability Long life stainless steel spring. Over-travel insertion stop on the spine. Flared floorplate aids magazine handling and disassembly. Pop-off Impact/Dust Cover to minimize debris intrusion and for ammunition protection in storage and transit

I need help with $200 and I'm losing hope, I never lose my faith in God but me and my family wont have a roof over our heads for our 2 year old if we don't come up with the money by tonight and this has broken me down more than you will ever know, we have been sleeping in my truck and I dont get paid till next Wednesday night to pay the rest of the rent, my number is 615-439-8899, I would be more than glad to talk with someone and tell them our story and how we got here or please pray for me and my family as I'm just needing some help or a loan and anything that points me in the right direction, I dont care what it takes to save my family and will write a contract and sign it, let you hold my bank card or the registration to my truck I would do it or help would be something I would never forget, I'm really scared and have prayed and prayed and prayed and ask God to take care of this thank you and God Bless ANYTHING HELPS I'm only doing this for my 2 year old, if you can't help just please send me a message saying you will pray for me and my son thank you so much, I don't care what I have to do to keep this roof over our heads, if its a loan then I can give some collateral to hold, or I can do whatever to work it off I just need help, if its not the full $200 then anything helps even if its a little! Thank you and god bless, just a simple message saying I will pray for you helps as well PLEASE I need some assistance and just a friend to talk to that can help ANYTHING HELPS I ALMOST HAVE EVERYTHING I NEED please let me know if I can do anything to earn it or a loan would have written terms and I will sign it, I really need help and prayer as I am starting to panic and I can't find any help, I have a 2 year old and I just want the help for him please I can meet with anyone to prove I'm not a fake or a bad person I'm just in a tough spot, for some reason my cry for help is going unnoticed and don't know what to do, the reason he was able to make us leave until i pay that is due to me not being on the lease as I took over the payments for another person so I wouldn't have to pay a down payment and he is being really unfair, I will even let you call and talk to him cause I don't want people to think I'm not a real person that needs help, PLEASE JUST A SIMPLE MESSAGE SAYING YOU WILL PRAY MEANS ALOT, cause I can't find the last bit of help I desperately need, I don't care if I have to give someone my bank card to hold and my social security card, even the registration to my truck just so you know I have to come back to pay if its a loan, I never use craigslist and posted this as my last resort so if someone could please explain why I can't get help or if there is something I should do to make people know that I am real person in need of help, I have received messages saying people are cautious to meet in person, well to prove I'm really in need I will meet at a police station or anywhere that makes you comfortable, this has been the hardest thing we have ever been through, God bless ANYONE who takes the time to message me and say they will pray for us THANKS The only reason I am posting here is cause I am running out of options and losing hope so I know it will most likely be flagged but I just need a friend

title: For Sale:  Remington 870 with Trijicon RX30
postcontent:
Good day,
For is is a 12ga Remington 870 Express Magnum, used. This gun and optics package is mechanically sound, and in great shape. While I may have enjoyed this shotgun when I got it 11 years ago, tastes change, and it no longer interests me. Here are all the notable details:
- Pre-Cerberus / Freedom Group. This is before Remington's reputation went downhill. - Capacity 6+1 for 2-3/4", or 5+1 for 3". - 18" cylinder bore barrel with front bead - OEM magazine tube extension - Freshly refinished with Cerakote H-148 "Burnt Bronze" prior to the sale. Unscratched and unfired as of now. - Trijicon RX30 on RX11 mount. Currently not sighted in since refinish job. I can gladly offer to shoot it in with some slugs before the sale. - Knoxx CompStock generation 1 "maximum recoil reduction" stock with dual tension springs. - Magpul SGA forearm - Mesa Tactical SureShell, 6rd (high-quality hardcoat anodized aluminum part, not a cheap plastic side saddle like ATI) - Receiver drill and tapped for Weaver 98 base - GG&G follower - Earlier barrel lug design with spring-loaded detent. - Flextab system
As I said before, this is a used gun. The finish is perfectly fresh, though there are a few tiny dings present pre-finishing. No wear or blemishes I would call "noteworthy" though. No gaurantees are given, but the shotgun and optic has performed to my satisfaction over the past 11 years.
Thank you, -Josh Geho

title: For Sale:  Snowy Mountain Rifles 6.5x47 Lapua Package
postcontent: *Will ship to an FFL if the buyer pays shipping*This is a ground-up custom built by Snowy Mountain Rifles with the following components:  -Snowy Mountain Rifles 3600 Tactical action.  This is a Defiance Deviant with SMR's info engraved on the action.  Integral 20MOA picatinny rail, one-piece fluted bolt. -Benchmark Stainless 5R Barrel, 22", 1:8 twist with Snowy Mountain Rifles muzzle brake.  5/8x24 threads. -Manners T4-A stock with left-side flush cups for sling and adjustable LOP kit with Pachmayr Decelerator pad.  Action was bedding into the stock by SMR. -Snowy Mountain bottom metal for AI mags.  Works flawlessly with MagPul mags. -TriggerTech trigger set at 1.5 pounds. -CeraKote MagPul FDE on the barreled action, bottom metal, and scope with Patriot Brown on the bolt shroud/handle, rings, level.  The bipod is half Patriot, half FDE. -Stock was professionally hydrodipped by Hydro-Dip in Idaho.  The pattern is Kryptek Highlander with a textured top coat.  It looks amazing and feels great.  Includes: -Vortex Viper HS-LR 6-24x50 FFP with XLR reticle. -American Rifle Company M-10 rings. -Flatline Ops "Sniper" Level -Harris S-BRM bipod. -Pelican 1750 case, OD green. -Midway shooting mat/rifle case, OD green. -MagPul AICS-style magazine x 1 -200pcs of once-fired Lapua brass, already neck-sized and tumbled in MTM boxes.  The rifle has been fired exactly 200 times with break-in and primary load development already completed.  I feel like it's capable of better accuracy with more playing around with powder/charge/etc.  The pictured group is 5-shots at 100 yards with 130 grain Berger VLD Hunting, 38.5 grains of Varget, and CCI 450 primers.  I was shooting off of the bipod with a rear bag.  The chrono averaged 2,855fps with those loads.  The hole up and left is from a bullet fragment coming back through the target backer since my range has steel ramps behind the targets.  It also shoots sub half inch 5-shot groups with 140 grain Nosler Partitions, 140 grain Berger Long Range, and 142 grain Sierra Matchkings.  It shoots great with H-4350 and it shoots decent groups with 140 grain Berger VLD Hunting, more than good enough for hunting but I was going for extreme accuracy.

title: For Sale:  FREEDOM MUNITIONS 9MM 115 GR RN REMANUFACTURED
location: Eastside of St. Paul, Minneapolis / St. Paul, Minnesota
postcontent:
FREEDOM MUNITIONS Bullets features copper plating applied electrochemically to a precision swaged lead core. The base of the bullet is also fully coated in copper. FREEDOM MUNITIONS Bullets are proudly made out of the finest materials available in the United States in order to ensure performance delivered down range with each and every shot. Our process starts with a lead billet that is extruded into wire. The lead wire is then swaged into a core. The cores are copper plated, then re-struck once more. Though not common in the industry, this restrike process produces a bullet that is more uniform, with a more precise diameter and a smoother finish for a better shooting and a better looking bullet. FREEDOM MUNITIONS Bullets Copper Plated projectiles are re-struck to ensure our diameters are precise and consistent from bullet to bullet and lot to lot.

title: For Sale:  Thompson "Tommy Gun" Auto Ordinance 45ACP WWII
postcontent:
Thompson “Tommy Gun” Auto-Ordnance Semiautomatic Rifle .45 acp WWII Tribute #187 out of 300
Only 300 World War II Tribute Thompsons will be issued in this strictly limited edition. Do not hesitate to become one of the fortunate owners of this historic, museum-quality masterpiece. Since the 1920s, the unmistakable profile of the Thompson has evoked a sense of respect and awe. And that sense grows ever more powerful when connected to the men who gave everything in World War II. By acquiring your own World War II Tribute Thompson today you will help to ensure the memory of these brave ones and the sacrifices they made in the name of freedom will not be forgotten.
 
Right side of the receiver features Marines sweeping across Okinawa, routing the last of the Japanese forces. On the right corner of the scene, a Marine lays down a hail of cover fire from his Tommy gun. Also featured on the right is a battle-ready American Soldier brandishing his Thompson. On each side of the receiver is the American flag, waving proudly in the wind.
 
Left side of the receiver features a combat-ready Soldier brandishing his mighty Thompson. The iconic image of an American infantryman and his legendary Tommy gun became a rallying symbol for the Allied cause. Also featured is an incredibly detailed scene of an infantry regiment advancing through the battle-scarred remains of a town under the protection of a heavy tank. Leading the charge, as was the protocol, is the man behind the Thompson.
 
The Tribute is highly-polished, blued steel, decorated with 24-karat gold plating and featuring all artwork in sparkling 24-karat gold and nickel. Complementing the gold are the Tribute’s richly polished walnut stocks.
 
Underneath the trigger guard you’ll find a proud American Soldier with his Thompson at the ready standing in front of Old Glory.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Rebates are Everywhere
postcontent: Folks, there are a ton of rebates out there right now that will get you a BNIB gun for much less than the extortionists on this sight.  For all you know they have purchased the gun and already submitted the rebate and now are selling for a mark up and get the rebate.  Active rebates are Springfield, Marlin, Ruger, S&W, Walther and Savage just to name a few.  Buy the way a tripod and a $50 scope does not constitute an upgrade causing a 2-3 hundred dollar markup.  Ammo is cheap online.  Often free shipping.  Anyone who buys ammo online need to do their homework.  Its not your problem that they hoarded at high prices and now are trying to recoup through you.  AR15 Platforms are under $400 and descent brands like Bushmaster unter $500.  Don't get screwed.  Use the Internet.

title: For Sale:  Sig Sauer P220 Legion 45ACP
postcontent: ASK ABOUT OUR 60-DAY LAY-A-WAY!!!For Sale is a NEW Sig Sauer P220 Legion 45ACP.  The P220 Legion is an enhanced version of the gun that started it all for modern day SIG. Finished in a proprietary Legion gray coating and featuring custom G-10 grips with a Legion medallion, the P220 Legion is improved in nearly every way. The stainless-steel slide sports SIG SAUER Electro-Optics X-RAY high visibility day/night sights as well as front cocking serrations that provide greater purchase for cycling the action, clearing the firearm or conducting press checks.The P220 in DA/SA includes a reduced and contoured Elite beavertail, which allows for a higher grip and a reduced profile, thus eliminating printing. More aggressive front strap checkering and additional checkering under the trigger guard enhance the grip. An X-Five undercut has been applied to the trigger guard, allowing for a higher grip and greater control. The P220 Legion also features low-profile decocking and slide-catch levers to reduce the risk of snagging. An enhanced polished action with the SRT (Short-Reset Trigger) is augmented with a Grayguns, Inc. P-SAIT trigger. In addition, a solid steel guide rod adds weight where it matters most. The P220 Legion ships with three 8-round magazines.Stop by our store or give us a call for more information!You must be legally allowed to own this pistol and are responsible for knowing your own local laws and regulations.  We will ship this pistol anywhere in the ConUSA for $35.  Thanks for looking!

title: For Sale:  CUSTOM AR15 SPIKES/CALICOJACK/AAA .223W
postcontent:
**CUSTOM AR15 SPIKE’S CALICO JACK/AAA**
**LIMITED EDITION** GunTec Polished Honeycomb series handguard, rail, upper and grip. The handguard is made out of T6 Aluminum Body. Has 5 KeyMod Slots on 3 Sides of front end of handguard. Triangle / Diamond Cuts Through out Handguard to Reduce Weight. Rail system slides over barrel nut, and is locked up against receiver with 6 screws. Heavy duty. 15" Length is with an internal diameter of 1.34”. The stock is Lightweight Skeletonized Design and made out of 6061 Aluminum Tube, and Steel Endplate. Short Textured Buttplate, Non Slip Design. Complete with buffer tube, end plate, Ambi 1 Point sling plate, HD Castle Nut, CAR 3 oz buffer, & chrome silicon buffer spring. Total length is 10.5". The Pistol Grip is made out of T6 Aluminum which makes it extremely light weight weighing only 3.1oz! Ergonomic Grooves for a non-slip design. The Upper is made out of T6 6061 Aluminum.
 
Phase 5 bolt carrier group which is nickel plated, heat treated & hardened. Hardened gas key, grade 8 hardened fasteners, type III sealing compound. Cleaning is minimal, usually requiring only a soft cloth. Permits firing for longer periods of time between cleaning, as dirt and powder residue has no wet or oily surface to cling to. EN provides a high lubricity and low friction co-efficient, greatly increasing the life expectancy of a firearm due to reduced friction wear. EN electroless nickel plating has several advantages versus electroplating, it provides an even deposit regardless of workpiece geometry, and with the proper per-plate catalyst, can deposit on non-conductive surfaces.
 
BCM GunFighter Ambidextrous Charging Handle. Charging Handle and Extended Latch System and forged from 7075 T6 Aluminum. Hard Coat Anodized per Mil-A-8625F, Type III, Class 2. GFH - Mod3 (large latch) and Mod4 (medium latch)
 
Strike Industries Extended Takedown and Pivot Pins are precision machined from high-strength steel, with a larger, easy-to-use top.
 
Strike Industries Forward Assist Plunger is made of lightweight aluminum for those looking to retain the functionality of a forward assist, while seeking weight savings wherever they can. The forward assist pawl is constructed of tool steel to ensure positive engagement of the forward assist ratchets on compatible bolt carriers and maintain long service life.
 
AAA Side Port Muzzle Break is made from high grade stainless steel. 1/2x28. Reduces Recoil and Barrel Rise and self timing.
 
Balisitic Advantage chambered .223W 16” pencil barrel is machined from 416 Stainless Steel with a bead blasted finish. It is 1.00" Gas Block Seat for .625" Low Profile Gas Block.
 
CMC tactical trigger is a completely self-contained, 100% drop-in fire control group upgrade for AR15. Building on the original Super Match design, the double patented Tactical Flat Trigger design yields truly remarkable and unprecedented trigger control, trigger feel and accuracy, while also the retaining the rugged reliability of a Mil-Spec trigger group. Trigger pull is factory pre-set between 3-1/2 and 4 pounds, and is not user adjustable. Fits all standard Mil-Spec lower receivers with .154" trigger and hammer pin holes.
 
CMMG gas tube is made from high quality stainless steel, and has the roll pin to secure it in your gas block. Made for mid length gas systems, this tube is bent in the correct place at the correct angle.
 
Seekins Precision Ambidextrous Safety Selector allows the shooter to easily switch from a standard 90 degree throw to a 60 degree short throw. The SP selector also features a screw design for solid lock-up so you don't have to worry about levers falling off. Made from rugged aluminum and hard coat anodized.
 
Elftmann Tactical Push Button Ambi Speed Safety. Quickly take your AR from safety to fire and back to safe with the simple push of a button. This is the fastest safety selector to engage and disengage on the market, with no rotation necessary, no shifting of the shooters hand needed. Extremely fast on-off, Ambidextrous Operation. Precision machined from hardened Stainless Steel

title: For Sale:  Skywatch Mobile Guard Tower
postcontent: This is a Skywatch Frontier Military Mobile Guard Tower that can be used for so many different applications. Can be powered by battery bank/solar/ Diesel generator (GenSet) or Shore power (110). This type of diesel generator is made for RVs and other applications where a large/quiet/portable power station is needed. They typically cost around $10,000 new and are made by Cummins (Google Onan QD 7,500 or see pic for model.) The towers usually go for $50,000 to $100,000 but that is with new paint and military/police hardware etc. The Norman Police bought a striped down military one like this in 2011 (see part of a NewsOK article I found online below)."----NewsOK:A new Skywatch tower retails for about $96,000, but the agency located a slightly used "military surplus" one that was available for $7,500, including the cost of a new paint job, Capt. Tom Easley said.Easley said Homeland Security federal grant money was used to pay for it."We got a smokin' hot deal on it," Praizner said. "We feel really lucky to have found it. We see it as a crime-prevention tool. It gives us visibility and a presence in large-crowd type situations. It will allow us to respond quicker to problems than if we were just walking through a crowd."------"It works great. It had been completely sanded and has two coats of black automotive primer and my paint guy has started the main camo coat which is going to turn out great! Would be great to use for hunting as a mobile deer stand but also had plenty of other uses. I recently loaned it out to a friend and we parked it in plain view near the entrance to a job site that was experiencing a lot of theft. We raised the tower each night and kicked on the lights. The thieves must have assumed there was a a 24 hour guard on site because the incidence of theft dropped to zero. Serious inquiries only please. If you are interested please email me with your contact information and we can schedule a time to look it over. I am continuing to make improvements and can customize to your specs.
